briefTitle: An 18 Week Efficacy and Safety Study of Saxagliptin and Metformin XR Combination in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Type 2 diabetics taking metformin IR or XR greater than or equal to 850mg and less than or equal to 1500mg only for at least 8 weeks prior to screening
* A1c: 7.5-11% (at screening)
* BMI less than or equal to 45 kg/m2

Exclusion Criteria:

* Significant cardiovascular history
* Active liver disease, renal impairment

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in HbA1c Level From Baseline to Week 18 (LOCF)
outcomeMeasures.description: Adjusted mean change from baseline in HbA1c achieved with saxagliptin added on to metformin versus metformin at Week 18 (Randomized Analysis Set). HbA1c is a continuous measure, the change from baseline for each participant is calculated as the Week 18 value minus the baseline value.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in 2-hour PPG Following Mixed Meal Tolerance Test (MMTT) From Baseline to Week 18 (LOCF)
outcomeMeasures.description: Adjusted mean change from baseline in 2-hour PPG (following MMTT) achieved with saxagliptin added on to metformin versus metformin at Week 18 (Randomized Analysis Set). PPG is a continuous measure, the change from baseline for each participant is calculated as the Week 18 value minus the baseline value.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in FPG From Baseline to Week 18 (LOCF)
outcomeMeasures.description: Adjusted mean change from baseline in FPG achieved with saxagliptin added on to metformin versus metformin at Week 18 (Randomized Analysis Set). FPG is a continuous measure, the change from baseline for each participant is calculated as the Week 18 value minus the baseline value.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent of Subjects Reaching Goal (HbA1c <7%) at Week 18 (LOCF) - Percent of Subjects (1)
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent of subjects achieving therapeutic response (HbA1c \<7.0%) at Week 18 (LOCF) (Randomized analysis set)
